programme.title: Bruno
programme.desc: Spoof documentary starring Sacha Baron Cohen. An outrageous gay fashion journalist decides to re-launch his career in Los Angeles after disgracing himself in his native Austria. programme.title: My Best Friend's Wedding

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Spy action thriller, starring Matt Damon, Julia Stiles and Joan Allen. programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Mystery thriller based on Dan Brown's forerunner to The Da Vinci Code, starring Tom Hanks and Ayelet Zurer. With the election of a new pope imminent, the Illuminati kidnap the four leading contenders and issue a coded message that they will murder the men and blow up the Vatican. programme.title: The Girl on the Train
programme.desc: Mystery thriller based on the bestselling novel, starring Emily Blunt and Rebecca Ferguson. Divorce is made all the more painful for Rachel Watson because her morning commute takes her past the home where her ex-husband lives with his new wife. Rachel becomes curious about an attractive couple living close by, and her interest develops into an obsession when the woman is declared missing. programme.title: American Beauty

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview-September 2024
programme.desc: Sky Sports is the home of the Premier League, F1, elite boxing and much more must-watch sport. Here are the best offers available on Sky Sports packages today.

programme.title: Monday
programme.desc: Two Americans living in Athens meet in the heat of summer one whirlwind weekend. When Chloe's time in Greece is drawing to a close, she decides to give up her high-flying job back home, and explore whether one weekend's passion can stand the reality of the inevitable Monday. programme.title: Everybody Wants Some!!
programme.desc: Eternally cool director Richard Linklater's "spiritual sequel" to 1993's slacker hit Dazed and Confused follows a house full of baseball jocks as they spend some quality party time together before the start of the 1980 college year. Over four wonderfully wasted days, freshman Jake (Blake Jenner) bonds with his new teammates over bongs, babes, beer and batting practice... all to some of the finest tracks ever to grace a cassette player. programme.title: Anyone But You
programme.desc: Bea and Ben enjoy an incredible first date, but attraction quickly burns out and they are delighted to be apart. However, fate compels the duo to reconsider, and they seize the opportunity to attend a lavish wedding in Australia, as a couple. programme.title: Gladiator

programme.title: Poker Face
programme.desc: Tech billionaire and gambler Jake Foley hosts a high-stakes poker game between childhood friends, offering them the chance to win more money than they've ever dreamed of. However, the evening takes a turn when he unveils his elaborate plan seeking revenge for their betrayals, and to play, they will have to give up the one thing they've spent their lives trying to keep - their secrets. As the game unfolds, thieves break in and they must band together to survive a night of terror. programme.title: Entertainment
programme.desc: Sonu Sood won the 'Best Actor in a Negative Role' award at the Stardust Awards, India 2014.

programme.title: Singh IS King
programme.desc: Shreya Ghoshal won the 'Best Playback Singer - Female' award and Akshay Kumar won the 'Best Actor' award at various award functions.

programme.title: Padman
programme.desc: (Movie@6) This film won the National Film Awards 2019 for Best Film on Social Issues.

programme.title: Rustom
programme.desc: Akshay Kumar won 'Best Actor' award at the National Film Awards, India 2017 and Tinu Suresh Desai won 'Best Director' award at the Screen Awards - 2017.

programme.title: Dosti - Friends Forever
programme.desc: Karan, a wealthy young man, is saved by Raj, a poor guy, from a near-death accident, which gives rise to their unending tale of friendship and brotherhood. (2005).

programme.title: Amir Garib
programme.desc: Moni lives a dual life, that of a musician and the other as a thief whose motive is to help the needy and poor. He falls in love with Soni but later finds out that she is not who she claims to be.

programme.title: Biwi Ho To Aisi
programme.desc: (1988) Mrs. Bhandari rules over her house with an iron hand. Her son gets married to Shalu (Rekha) and soon her reign of terror is challenged and a no holds barred battle ensues.

programme.title: Deewangee
programme.desc: The struggle of a woman to save his husband and family from the curse of wealth and a man thinking that wealth will bring him all the happiness.

programme.title: Ram Tere Kitne Naam
programme.desc: Peturam, a sensitive and obese man, falls in love with a beautiful woman named Radha. However, her brother orders him to gather INR 10 lakh in order to win her hand in marriage.

programme.title: Hero Hindustani
programme.desc: A man realizes that India is completely alien to his London-raised granddaughter and arranges her marriage there. She gets a guide to pose as her fiance and falls for him.

programme.title: Suhaag
programme.desc: (Movie @6) College friends Ajay & Raj always play pranks on each other & then get into trouble. One day, Ajay needs his birth certificate for his passport, but he is shocked to find out his real name.

programme.title: Akhanda
programme.desc: To save the saviour Murali Krishna from an evil Varadarajulu's trap, Lord Shiva's ardent devotee, Akhanda, moves heaven and earth.

programme.title: Karz
programme.desc: The duo Laxmikant - Pyarelal won 'Best Music Director' award at the Filmfare Awards - 1981.

programme.title: Prem Rog
programme.desc: At the Filmfare Awards 1983, Padmini Kolhapure won the 'Best Actress' award, Raj Kapoor won the 'Best Director and Editor' award, Santosh Anand won the 'Best Lyricist' award.

programme.title: Jis Desh Mein Ganga Behti Hai
programme.desc: Raj Kapoor won an award for the 'Best Actor and Best Film', G. G. Mayekar won the 'Best Editor and M. R. Achrekar won the 'Best Art Director' award at the Filmfare Awards 1962.

programme.title: Hum Paanch
programme.desc: (1980) The story of a brave woman who stands up against the ruthlessness of a landlord and decides to teach him a lesson. Starring Shabana Azmi, Sanjeev Kumar and Mithun.

programme.title: Raja Ki Aayegi Baraat
programme.desc: Raja rapes Mala and the court orders him to marry her. His family continues to torture Mala and attempts to kill her, but she manages to win over Raja and his family with her good deeds.

programme.title: Koi Mil Gaya
programme.desc: (Movie @6) The film was praised and won many awards, including 'Best Special Effects, Best Director, Best Actor, Best Film, Best Screenplay, Best Cinematography, and Best Singer'.

programme.title: Chup
programme.desc: A lonesome florist with a new-found love interest and a psychopath killer who targets film critics in Mumbai. Are the two related? Inspector Arvind Mathur and Dr. Zenobia are about to find out.

programme.title: Chhoriya Chhoron Se Kam Nahi Hoti
programme.desc: A young girl wishes to become an IPS officer despite the opposition from her conservative father, who thinks a woman's place is in kitchen and struggles to achieve her dream.

programme.title: Pure Bollywood
programme.desc: Some of the best soundtracks of Bollywood uncut.

programme.title: Murder at Teesri Manzil 302
programme.desc: When a businessman's wife gets kidnapped, the investigating officer finds something unusual about the case. Will the officer solve the mystery?

programme.title: Surakksha
programme.desc: Officer Gopi (Mithun) aka Gunmaster G9 is called to investigate against an organisation which intends to spread terror in India.

programme.title: Kal Aaj Aur Kal
programme.sub-title: 1971 release film is about the ideological clash between three generations
programme.desc: grandparent, parent and youth. Stars: Prithviraj Kapoor, Raj Kapoor, Randhir Kapoor.

programme.title: Kaala Sona
programme.desc: Rakesh's father was killed years ago. His killer died too... or so Rakesh thought. But when he finds out that the killer is alive ahd the file closed he decides to avenge his father's murder himself.

programme.title: Jodi No 1
programme.desc: Partners in crime Jai and Veeru set their next target on a rich businessman, Rai Bahadur. Things turn hilarious when both of them fall for his daughters.

programme.title: Bad Boy
programme.desc: (Movie @6) When good-for-nothing Raghu falls in love with the studious Ritu, it feels like a recipe for disaster. Especially as Ritu's family is against their relationship. How will the lovers unite?

programme.title: Jabariya Jodi
programme.desc: Abhay, a righteous thug, forcefully kidnaps grooms who demand dowry and later marries them off. Babli, his childhood sweetheart, re-enters his life and changes his priorities.

programme.title: Khichdi 2
programme.desc: When an intelligence services agent discovers that Praful resembles the king of Paanthukistan, he enlists the help of the Parekh family to place Praful in the king's position and save his subjects.

programme.title: Firaaq
programme.desc: This blockbuster movie was praised at many awards ceremonies such as the Filmfare Awards, Screen Awards and Stardust Awards.

programme.title: Teen Patti
programme.desc: Shraddha Kapoor won the 'Favourite Promising Actress' award at the Lions Gold Awards 2011.

programme.title: Teri Meri Kahaani
programme.desc: A 2012 release. The story takes us through a journey of eternal love between a couple who have vowed to love each other not only in this life but in every life to follow.

programme.title: Leader
programme.desc: Dilip Kumar won the 'Best Actor' award at the Filmfare Awards 1965.

programme.title: Chitchor
programme.desc: (1976) Sweet, romantic film in which Vinod (Amol Palekar) impersonates Sunil (Vijayendra Ghatge) and his love Gauri (Zarina Wahab) and her parents learn about it.

programme.title: Holiday - A Soldier is Never Off Duty
programme.desc: This movie won Most Entertaining Action Film in the Big Star Entertainment Awards. Plus, Lux Awards for Best Film, Director (Shekhar Kapur), Actor (Anil Kapoor) and Actress (Sridevi).

programme.title: Hum Aapke Hain Kaun
programme.desc: (Movie @6) The film was praised and won several awards including 'Best Popular Film Providing Wholesome Entertainment' at the National Film Awards, India 1995.

programme.title: Heer Tey Tedhi Kheer
programme.desc: (R) Fate brings a clumsy but cheerful Heer and DJ, a rigid man, together in marriage. Can Heer overcome the challenge of being a mother-in-law to his three older daughters-in-law?

programme.desc: (R) Gurman gives her son away to her friend Prabhjot and adopts her daughter, Keerat, in his place. Years later, Keerat marries Gurman's biological son. Will Prabhjot accept her as a daughter-in-law?
